scripts.network:launcher: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/mewsfeed.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.network:browser: npm run build:happ && concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:agents:browser"
scripts.start:agent:browser: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ:browser" "sleep 5 && npm run start:browser -w ui"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ:browser: hc s clean && echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/mewsfeed.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a mewsfeed network mdns
scripts.test:sweet: npm run build:happ && set -x && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 time cargo test -- --nocapture
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package:ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.package:ui: npm run build -w ui && cd ui/dist && bestzip ../dist.zip *
scripts.build:happ: rm -f dnas/**/workdir/*.dna && npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/mewsfeed/workdir
